task.summary: - ObjectFactory#create...() methods lookup - small code improvements
- package improvements - splitting macros code to classes
- extract predicate out of createMethodsFilter - javadoc
- call create...() when we need object for setter, not for converter
extract createOnNull as separate class and macro
use TypeApply for generic methods of ObjectFactory
use annotation to indicate how to replace arguments of function call
- new syntax - move default mappers to yajom-macros module (part of lib) - adding junit lib for tests and 2 tests
throw exception if outside of YAJOM
method any on YajomCollection was added
macroses should accept function returning values too just ignore result

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: macroses should accept function returning values too just ignore result
